worlds.worldLore: Endless fields of green under a perpetual midday sun, teeming with life.
A barren, icy landscape where silence rules under the northern lights.
An ancient forest shrouded in mystery and home to mythical creatures.
Radiant crystals illuminate these caves, creating a dazzling display of colors.
Ruins of a once-thriving city now submerged beneath tranquil waters.
A vast desert where the wind whispers ancient secrets among the sands.
Floating islands drifting in the sky, reachable only by those who dare to fly.
Towering volcanoes that forge both destruction and new lands with their fiery might.
A dimension existing between day and night, where time flows unpredictably.
Ancient ruins holding lost knowledge and untold stories, hidden from the eyes of the modern world.
